name: HyperbaricLink
tag_list: healthcare, healthcare-information, hyperbaric-oxygen-therapy, wound-care, consumer, healthcare-professionals
overview:
HyperbaricLink is an independent web guide to hyperbaric oxygen therapy, an FDA-approved medical treatment for specific diseases and conditions including chronic wounds, which effect an estimated 7 million people in the United States.

The website provides directories of hospital-based and free-standing hyperbaric treatment centers, physicians and clinicians specializing in hyperbaric oxygen therapy, and diseases and conditions treated with hyperbaric oxygen. Information from the company’s databases is also shared with select business partners.

Information on diseases and conditions treated with hyperbaric oxygen therapy includes an Evidence Index summarizing the current state of research regarding the treatment of the condition with hyperbaric oxygen therapy and the disease or condition’s approval status. Also included are links to published scientific papers, clinical trials, and other relevant information.

HyperbaricLink.com is a product of HyperbaricLink LLC, a Massachusetts Limited Liability Company.
